text: if nougat candy was the train for last
year for this year 2022 in vietnam the
hot trend for that confessionary line is
bolt tucked with caramelized nuts it's a
great item to add to the vietnamese new
year candy tray the tablets are in
shapes of little boats filled with
varied kinds of nut coated in a layer of
butter and caramel they are so precious
and tasty let's learn how to make them
you will need a hundred gram of
all-purpose flour a mix of nuts of your
choice like almonds macadamia pumpkin
seeds potatoes and walnuts you will need
about 20 grams each 20 gram of brown
sugar 15 gram of almond flour 5 gram of
powdered sugar 40 grams of butter 25
grams of yogurt 10 gram of honey 8 ml of
whipping cream and 16 gram of corn syrup
to make the shell for the book tart in a
large mixing bowl combine 100 gram of
all-purpose flour 15 grams of almond
flour 5 gram of powdered sugar and a
pinch of salt give it a good mix and
then add 20 gram of butter use your
hands to mix and combine the flour with
butter when it comes together add the
yogurt then knit well until a dough is
formed if you can't buy the bulk tart
mold you can fold little bolts from
parchment paper and aluminum foil just
like i do just for as demonstrated
making sure that the paper bolt is a
little bit smaller than the aluminum
foil bolt so you can line the ladder
with the former
now divide the dough into two equal
portions wrap each portion in saran wrap
and roll out into a rectangular sheet
it's about one cm thick and the width
should be as long as the bolt till the
dough sheet in the refrigerator for 15
to 20 minutes then cut into smaller
portions with similar size to the bolt
touch shell line them all with the dough
to form the base of the bolt tart
trim the edges and use a fork to poke a
few holes at the base so that the steam
can escape when we bake bake for 15
minutes in a preheated oven at 150
degrees celsius then take out and leave
to cool
[Music]
to make the filling melt 20 gram butter
in a small saucepan add 20 gram of brown
sugar 10 gram honey 16 gram of corn
syrup and 8 grams of whipping cream stir
over high heat until bubbly
roughly chop up the nuts accept the
macadamia nut then add to the caramel
and mix well take off heat and when the
mixture is still warm add to top the
toilets
place the whole macadamia nut in the
center then fill the boat with the
caramelized mixed nuts
sprinkle with some roasted sesame seeds
bake the chocolate at 150 degrees
celsius for another 10 to 15 minutes
mmm it smells so good out of the oven
with a very good looking caramel color
every bite is a harmonious combination
of nuts with the crispy and buttery
crust so tasty and luxurious what a
great addition to the new year candy
tray and it can also be given as great
gift on third holiday i wish you success
with the recipe and send me a photo if
you give it a try if you like the video
don't forget to thumbs up and subscribe
to my channel for more i will see you
then next time bye
[Music]
you
